skills.skill: Anesthesia monitoring / Surgical preparation and assisting / Patient recovery

duties_responsibilities.duty: Support Technician and Doctor teams by creating a positive, low-stress atmosphere for clients and patients.
Deliver an outstanding client experience to provide exceptional care to every patient.
Lead and supervise the RVT team.

Utilize knowledge and skills in physical examinations, anesthesia monitoring, surgical preparation, dentistry, radiology, laboratory work, venipuncture, catheter placement, pharmacy, and compassionate care of hospitalized animals.
